name: Chicken Gorgonzola Quesadillas
author: whereisdiana
summary: Creamy chicken Gorgonzola and spinach quesadillas. If you love Gorgonzola cheese, this is your dish.
ingredients: 2 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-size pieces and pounded thin
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
2  flour tortillas, or more as desired
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Season chicken with salt and pepper
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add chicken; cook until no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 3 to 4 minutes
Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion is golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes
Place 1 tortilla on prepared baking sheet; layer with 1/2 of the Gorgonzola cheese, spinach, and chicken mixture; top with remaining Gorgonzola cheese
Place remaining tortilla on top and gently press down to flatten the quesadilla
Bake quesadilla in preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes; cut into triangles
